WARNING: Explicit Content Warning: This page is intended for mature audiences. Under no circumstances should these lyrics be regarded as fact. Any failure of this content to appear satirical is solely due to a lack of talent... If you are easily offended, or are under 35 years old please navigate away from this page.
[Website-http://www.incestbyproxy.com]
Want to hear the music? Full-length MP3s of selected songs on our Podcast.

item.title: Incest by Proxy Announcement 4/27/2006
item.description: BUCKETOFFUCK Under the telepathic command of George W. Bush, we have now created an entire website dedicated to free porn.

item.title: Captain Maggotcunt's Musings 12/20/05
item.description: I fucking hate Mario Cantone. That's all there is to it.

item.title: The Reverend's Rantings 12/13/05
item.description:
I was recently priveleged to the secret of success behind our favorite super centre, Wal-Mart. In order to prepare employees for price droppings, there is a pre-shift ritual in which the poor, health insuranceless bastards chant in unison near the front of the super centre. Not only does this get the workers totally pumped up, it lets the Wal-Mart super centres all over the country say "Thank you America! Thank you for making us your largest corporation by forcing you to give us your money because you can't afford to give it to anyone else, and shitting on you if you have no choice but to work at one of our super centres because you can't find another job." Now I have never actually seen this ritual take place as I do what I can to avoid the inevitable Wal-Mart super centre around the corner (I'll do my shopping at K-Mart, thank you very much), but I urge you all investigate further. I'd do it myself, but honestly, I'm terrified that I'll be trampled. May God bless the Republicans.

The Reverend

item.title: Incest by Proxy Congratulates Irving Lewis "Scooter" Libby and Friends
item.description: You may be facing 30 years, but at least your book is selling like mad. This is the kind of writing that makes Incest by Proxy proud to be republicans. Just remember, you're not the only name in this newly mainstream genre we call "Republornography." You must still contend with, Bill O'Reilly, Lynne Cheney, and of course Incest by Proxy.

item.title: Conservatives and Gay Marriage: Fear of Commitment
item.description:
Jeff Gannon, supposed "boy-toy" of President Bush, male prostitute, and respected journalist visited the white house a recorded 1 9 6 times over a 2 year period.

Many believe that this is an indication of the president's sexual preference. Still others believe that Bush is "over that".

We're sorry, but Incest by Proxy ain't stupid enough to believe this garbage. We are endeared to and respect president Bush. We will not be influenced by this communist propaganda. However, in the interest of truth, and to solve the question of whether is is better for a president to give or to receive. Incest by Proxy is prepared to "dare" one or more of the alleged men who have engaged in homosexual activity with President Bush to "prove it."

If you have engaged in homosexual activity with President George W. Bush, please describe your encounter in explicit detail and email it to us at info@incestbyproxy.com Additional evidence (i.e., photo of your fraternity sweater stained with George W. Bush's semen or feces) may be included as an attachment. If your story is TRUE, we will send you a copy of "First Blood" and one of our 100% cotton Incest by Proxy T-shirts (hand printed by Capt. Maggotcunt himself).

*We reserve the right to post any winning stories on our blog or website.*


George W.Bush and James Guckert a.k.a Jeff Gannon on Gay Marriage

item.title: Captain Maggotcunt's Musings 10/31/05
item.description: Have you noticed that the "Support our Troops" stickers often double as a Jesus fish?

item.title: The Reverend's Rantings : A Message to Green Day 10/31/05
item.description:
Now that September has ended, I have woken up and its damn near November. I decided to wait an extra month just to be sure. I went to sleep hoping that I wouldn't have to hear that fucking song, but low and behold. September has ended and its still there to remind us all that its going to be ok, and we have nothing to worry about. If only I shared the optimism of some so-called punk bitch creating cinematic videos for MTV that remind us all why we strategically place "support our troops" stickers on our SUVs. We must stay the course. If only Green Day would stop, we could put this terrible ordeal behind us. Be safe, and God bless.

-The Reverend
